name: Straits of the World Online Quiz | Physical Geography | 10 Questions

questions.text: The two straits, the Bosporus and the Dardanelles, are on opposite ends of what Sea?
In which strait can you find the islands Matsu and Quemoy?
Which of these straits played an instrumental role in the old spice trade?
Which strait played a part in the Punic wars?
You can look over white cliffs onto what strait?
You can find the straits called the Little Minch and the North Minch off the coast of what country?
The Strait of Juan de Fuca separates which two countries?
questions.explanation:
United States and Canada.

	The Strait of Juan de Fuca separates the state of Washington and Vancouver Island of British Columbia.

questions.text: What is the name of the strait that separates the United States from its nearest non-contiguous neighbor (in other words, not Canada or Mexico)?
What is the southernmost strait in the world?
When going from the Baltic Sea to the North Sea, what is the name of the last strait you leave?  (Hint: also considered an inlet of the North Sea.)
